tracks.title: Lessen The Damage
lyrics: When you crossed me, didn't know what you had done
A chain reaction happened and it's too late to run
You look at me, I look at you
And you know what I'm gonna do
When I see red, I go
And there's no bandage to lessen the damage
And I give as good as I get
You've got no advantage to lessen the damage
When I find my target, I will point and shoot
Hit you where it hurts now, don't you try to move
You look at me, I look at you
And you know what I'm gonna do
When I see red, I go
And there's no bandage to lessen the damage
And I give as good as I get
You've got no advantage to lessen the damage
Let me be the one to destruct her
Let me be the one to destruct her
Let me be the one to destruct her
Let me be the one to destruct her
When I see red, I go
And there's no bandage to lessen the damage
And I give as good as I get
You've got no advantage to lessen the damage

lyrics: How did she get so mean?
How did she get so mean?

Every day I wake up, it's a struggle, yeah
Love me when I'm under your spell

You taught me how to hate myself, yuck
How did she get so mean?
How did she get so mean?
How did she get so mean?

Dirt is all up in my wounds

tracks.title: Hysteria
lyrics: I can't say I'm in control of my moods
You light me up like a short fuse
Little girl with somethin' to prove
Must be what I like about you
La, la, la-la-la, la, la-la-la, la, ah
La, la, la-la-la, la, la-la-la, la, ah
There's no box big enough to hold them
I try my best at rationalization
But there's no title for classification
I didn't mean to scare ya
I didn't mean to do you no harm
Didn't mean to hit you so hard
It's like a wave when it comes over me
The chemicals rage in my body
I bite my cheeks 'cause I don't want to talk
It's hard enough just to live with my thoughts
La, la, la-la-la, la, la-la-la, la, ah

There's no box big enough to hold them

tracks.title: Her
lyrics: Run your mouth to keep her scared

tracks.title: Bloom
lyrics: We're nothing more than living matter
We're all the same cut at the center
Why did I try to grow up faster?
Still every day trying to be better
And you took what I gave to you
I took it back from you
Now like a flower, I'll bloom
What will I turn into after? (Who will I be?)
When dark comes to take me under (Go, go, go)
Could I be great or be remembered? (Can't measure me)
And you took what I gave to you
I took it back from you
And you took what I gave to you
I took it back from you
Bloom like a flower, I (We all go out the way we came)
Bloom like a flower (We're nothing, then we're claimed)
And you took what I gave to you (Take the chance to start again)
I took it back from you (And bloom like new)
Bloom like a flower, I (We all go out the way we came)
Bloom like a flower (We're nothing, then we're claimed)
And you took what I gave to you (Take the chance to start again)
I took it back from you (And bloom like new)
Now like a flower, I'll bloom

tracks.title: As Strange As It Seems
lyrics: I was a passenger in a speeding car
You showed no regard for me, for me
I was a careful girl with a broken heart
You showed no regard for me, for me
What did I get me into, into?
Why did I let you into me?
What did I get me into, into?
What did you turn me into casually?
As true as something you won't believe
Staring at the center of the end of the road
With the softest voice you never heard at all
I'm hanging on the steering wheel of a speeding car
I've got no regard for me, for me
What did I get me into, into?
Why did I let you into me?
What did I get me into, into?
What did you turn me into casually?
As true as something you won't believe
As true as something you won't believe
